00044 void b3Point2PointConstraint::getInfo1 (b3ConstraintInfo1* info,const b3RigidBodyData* bodies)
00045 {
00046         getInfo1NonVirtual(info,bodies);
00047 }

00049 void b3Point2PointConstraint::getInfo1NonVirtual (b3ConstraintInfo1* info,const b3RigidBodyData* bodies)
00050 {
00051                 info->m_numConstraintRows = 3;
00052                 info->nub = 3;

00057 
00058 void b3Point2PointConstraint::getInfo2 (b3ConstraintInfo2* info, const b3RigidBodyData* bodies)
00059 {
00060         b3Transform trA;
00061         trA.setIdentity();
00062         trA.setOrigin(bodies[m_rbA].m_pos);
00063         trA.setRotation(bodies[m_rbA].m_quat);
00064 
00065         b3Transform trB;
00066         trB.setIdentity();
00067         trB.setOrigin(bodies[m_rbB].m_pos);
00068         trB.setRotation(bodies[m_rbB].m_quat);
00069 
00070         getInfo2NonVirtual(info, trA,trB);
00071 }
00072 
00073 void b3Point2PointConstraint::getInfo2NonVirtual (b3ConstraintInfo2* info, const b3Transform& body0_trans, const b3Transform& body1_trans)
00074 {
00075 
00076          //retrieve matrices
00077 
00078         // anchor points in global coordinates with respect to body PORs.
00079    
00080     // set jacobian
00081     info->m_J1linearAxis[0] = 1;
00082         info->m_J1linearAxis[info->rowskip+1] = 1;
00083         info->m_J1linearAxis[2*info->rowskip+2] = 1;
00084 
00085         b3Vector3 a1 = body0_trans.getBasis()*getPivotInA();
00086         //b3Vector3 a1a = b3QuatRotate(body0_trans.getRotation(),getPivotInA());
00087 
00088         {
00089                 b3Vector3* angular0 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis);
00090                 b3Vector3* angular1 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis+info->rowskip);
00091                 b3Vector3* angular2 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J1angularAxis+2*info->rowskip);
00092                 b3Vector3 a1neg = -a1;
00093                 a1neg.getSkewSymmetricMatrix(angular0,angular1,angular2);
00094         }
00095     
00096         if (info->m_J2linearAxis)
00097         {
00098                 info->m_J2linearAxis[0] = -1;
00099                 info->m_J2linearAxis[info->rowskip+1] = -1;
00100                 info->m_J2linearAxis[2*info->rowskip+2] = -1;
00101         }
00102         
00103         b3Vector3 a2 = body1_trans.getBasis()*getPivotInB();
00104    
00105         {
00106         //      b3Vector3 a2n = -a2;
00107                 b3Vector3* angular0 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis);
00108                 b3Vector3* angular1 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis+info->rowskip);
00109                 b3Vector3* angular2 = (b3Vector3*)(info->m_J2angularAxis+2*info->rowskip);
00110                 a2.getSkewSymmetricMatrix(angular0,angular1,angular2);
00111         }
00112     
00113 
00114 
00115     // set right hand side
00116         b3Scalar currERP = (m_flags & B3_P2P_FLAGS_ERP) ? m_erp : info->erp;
00117     b3Scalar k = info->fps * currERP;
00118     int j;
00119         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00120     {
00121         info->m_constraintError[j*info->rowskip] = k * (a2[j] + body1_trans.getOrigin()[j] - a1[j] - body0_trans.getOrigin()[j]);
00122                 //printf("info->m_constraintError[%d]=%f\n",j,info->m_constraintError[j]);
00123     }
00124         if(m_flags & B3_P2P_FLAGS_CFM)
00125         {
00126                 for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00127                 {
00128                         info->cfm[j*info->rowskip] = m_cfm;
00129                 }
00130         }
00131 
00132         b3Scalar impulseClamp = m_setting.m_impulseClamp;//
00133         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00134     {
00135                 if (m_setting.m_impulseClamp > 0)
00136                 {
00137                         info->m_lowerLimit[j*info->rowskip] = -impulseClamp;
00138                         info->m_upperLimit[j*info->rowskip] = impulseClamp;
00139                 }
00140         }
00141         info->m_damping = m_setting.m_damping;
00142         
00143 }

00149         (void)timeStep;
00150

00152 
00155 void b3Point2PointConstraint::setParam(int num, b3Scalar value, int axis)
00156 {
00157         if(axis != -1)
00158         {
00159                 b3AssertConstrParams(0);
00160         }
00161         else
00162         {
00163                 switch(num)
00164                 {
00165                         case B3_CONSTRAINT_ERP :
00166                         case B3_CONSTRAINT_STOP_ERP :
00167                                 m_erp = value; 
00168                                 m_flags |= B3_P2P_FLAGS_ERP;
00169                                 break;
00170                         case B3_CONSTRAINT_CFM :
00171                         case B3_CONSTRAINT_STOP_CFM :
00172                                 m_cfm = value; 
00173                                 m_flags |= B3_P2P_FLAGS_CFM;
00174                                 break;
00175                         default: 
00176                                 b3AssertConstrParams(0);
00177                 }
00178         }
00179 }
00180 
00182 b3Scalar b3Point2PointConstraint::getParam(int num, int axis) const 
00183 {
00184         b3Scalar retVal(B3_INFINITY);
00185         if(axis != -1)
00186         {
00187                 b3AssertConstrParams(0);
00188         }
00189         else
00190         {
00191                 switch(num)
00192                 {
00193                         case B3_CONSTRAINT_ERP :
00194                         case B3_CONSTRAINT_STOP_ERP :
00195                                 b3AssertConstrParams(m_flags & B3_P2P_FLAGS_ERP);
00196                                 retVal = m_erp; 
00197                                 break;
00198                         case B3_CONSTRAINT_CFM :
00199                         case B3_CONSTRAINT_STOP_CFM :
00200                                 b3AssertConstrParams(m_flags & B3_P2P_FLAGS_CFM);
00201                                 retVal = m_cfm; 
00202                                 break;
00203                         default: 
00204                                 b3AssertConstrParams(0);
00205                 }
00206         }
00207         return retVal;
00208 }
